snippet.title: BFF or Die: Official Release Trailer (Couch Co-op Game on PC, Switch, PlayStation & Xbox)
snippet.description:
Out now on PC, Switch, PlayStation and Xbox!
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/652360/BFF_or_Die/
Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/bff-or-die-switch/
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP1249-CUSA24491_00-5161590649382433
Xbox: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/bff-or-die/9p1kmhf16gg1
Itch: https://asa-studio.itch.io/bff-or-die

BFF or Die is a cozy/crazy couch co-op puzzle game for one to four players. As time traveling aliens you’re sent on a risky rescue mission to Earth! Use your gadgets collaboratively to overcome danger and survive as a team.
